alert.note: Alert for Nicholas; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 1:39PM EST until January 04 at 1:52PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River at Blue Licks Spring affecting Robertson and Nicholas Counties. .Heavy rain from the past 12 hours have caused the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Licking River at Blue Licks Spring. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Cropland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 23.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 25.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this evening.
